meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ordinary.
meanings.sent1: The ordinarinesses of the situation made it easy to overlook.
meanings.sent2: In the small town, the ordinarinesses of daily life were comforting.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to turn the ordinarinesses of a hat into something extraordinary.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a way of brightening the ordinarinesses of any day.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the ordinarinesses of the landscape with stunning detail.

meanings.definition: The condition of being common or usual.
meanings.sent1: Despite the ordinarinesses of the dish, it was always a crowd favorite.
meanings.sent2: The ordinarinesses of the weather in this city never cease to amaze me.
meanings.sent3: The comedian found humor in the ordinarinesses of everyday interactions.
meanings.sent4: The writer's talent was turning the ordinarinesses of life into captivating stories.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the painting lay in its ability to elevate the ordinarinesses of the subject.
